==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|name_1      = Punch
|desc_1      = Punches twice, dealing '''80% ATK''', '''90% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Kick
|desc_2      = Performs a kick, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3      = Javelin Throw
|desc_3      = Throws a javelin at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} and consuming the javelin. The Forged Sand Javelineer possesses 2 javelins initially, and will no longer use this attack once they are both consumed.

|name_4      = Knife Throw
|desc_4      = Throws a knife at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used when both javelins are consumed.

|name_5      = Headspin
|desc_5      = Performs headspins while moving towards the player, dealing '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|Geo DMG}} upon contact.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A valiant warrior of the canyon, and a tribal guardian that patrols the crystal mountains and rivers.<br>In an era when the ridges were shattered and the tribes needed to rebuild, the warriors used javelins as markers to determine the locations on both sides of the canyon from which passages should be dug. That meant that each javelin had to be sunk deep into the rock.|[[Archive]]}}
